text: You die so that others may cheer.

name: cent_kill_10
text: No crowd shall cheer your name.
text_simple: no crowd shall cheer your name

name: cent_rival_01
text: Your reign as king is over.
text_simple: your reign as king is over

name: cent_rival_02
text: You are a better corpse than a king.
text_simple: you are a better corpse than a king

name: cent_rival_03
text: When ice meets blade, ice loses.
text_simple: when ice meets blade ice loses

name: cent_rival_08
text: A cloven skull for the cloven hooved.
text_simple: a cloven skull for the cloven hooved

name: cent_rival_09
text: There is no honor in back-stabbery.
text_simple: there is no honor in backstabbery

name: cent_rival_11
text: How do you like my axe, Axe?
text_simple: how do you like my axe axe

name: cent_rival_12
text: You call those little things axes?
text_simple: you call those little things axes

name: cent_rival_14
text: Your little axes were no match for mine.
text_simple: your little axes were no match for mine

name: cent_rival_16
text: Not so prized a fighter now.
text_simple: not so prized a fighter now

name: cent_rival_18
text: A strange, familiar beast you were.
text_simple: a strange familiar beast you were

name: cent_rival_19
text: You were unworthy of your form.
text_simple: you were unworthy of your form

name: cent_rival_20
text: Like a centaur, only weaker, and ugly.
text_simple: like a centaur only weaker and ugly

name: cent_rival_24
text: You may rise from your ashes, but I wouldn't recommend it.
text_simple: you may rise from your ashes but i wouldnt recommend it

name: cent_rival_25
text: Your reign of terror is over.
text_simple: your reign of terror is over

text: Arc Warden, your spark goes out.

text: Your wealth of legs offends me.
text_simple: your wealth of legs offends me
